/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, each with its own unique architectural style and color palette. On the left side of the street, modern high-rise buildings rise, their glass facades reflecting the overcast sky. In contrast, the right side of the street is adorned with traditional brick buildings, adding a touch of historical charm to the urban landscape. The street itself is a hive of activity with cars and buses navigating their way, and pedestrians going about their day. The sky overhead is a blanket of gray, casting a soft light over the scene. Despite the overcast conditions, the image exudes a sense of vibrancy and energy, characteristic of a thriving city like Beijing.
